website_summaries.verdict: An affordable manual model with a streamlined design. The best value in FoodSaver's family of vacuum food sealers.
pros: CrushFree Instant Seal protects and seals delicate foods
Manual design is a plus for those that don't want more control over the plastic-cutting process
cons: It doesn't seal quite as fast as costlier models, but considering the price, you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit based on reviews and previous FoodSaver unit I owned. Unit worked great the first couple of times I used it. After that, it would vacuum but not seal unless I pushed down on the lid also. I tried wetting the seal, different bags, etc. Now it will not seal no matter what. Return window closed a month ago... ***UPDATE - contacted FoodSaver and they are sending me a new one. Hopefully it will work better.
customer_reviews.author: Terri C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not vacuum. Sealing is good.
customer_reviews.text: Worked on a couple of items but fails to suction. The only ones that vacuumed (and that was a fraction of the time) was when we pushed down hard on it. Id give it zero stars but that is not a choice. Return is easy. Kohl's return and they refund your Amazon account. Videos of trying would not upload so i screenshot the video in a few places.
customer_reviews.author: mhollyf

customer_reviews.title: Disposable quality, at a durable goods price.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried two of these, and they only work for a couple of weeks. The sealer is fine, the vacuum quits working within a dozen uses. Awful. Update, I'm on sealer number three. You'll never get your money back and the postage to keep returning their products adds up fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tannhauser

customer_reviews.title: Go A Different Route
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because of the jar attachments. The machine works OK on bags, and did well on the jars, until the jar attachment stopped working a month after purchasing... just a few days after the ability to return the item was lost. Shocker.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dreher

customer_reviews.title: It's not that I hate this BUT I just got it out this week ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not that I hate this BUT I just got it out this week and it wouldn't work. I couldn't remember where it came from until just now and I can't send it back to Amazon. However, all was not lost because FoodSaver is replacing it as soon as I send this back. Now I have to pay postage to send it to FoodSaver eeerrrrr!!!! I have had FoodSavers in the past and they are worthwhile...this was just a lemon
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Bargin Basement Model
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the reviewers tended to say it was the "Volkswagen" model, but worked reliably. I works...but only one out of three times. It does seals ALL the time, but won't always extract the air consistently....so why bother???. I've used higher priced models that operated perfectly, so this model is the bargain basement model for a reason. I do, however, like that it is smaller, but still doesn't do me any good if it doesn't work. Now I wish I spent the extra $30 for the higher priced model.
customer_reviews.author: Always Summer Here

customer_reviews.title: User friendly!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous with some of the negative reviews, but very happy with my purchase. The vacuum seal works great and is easy to use out of the box. Doesn't take up much room in the kitchen. Food saver provides bags and a roll to make your own bag which was convenient. I placed photos of the instructions from the box. We have done veggies and meats already. We cut up veggies to add to our meals and we done have to constantly cut them up each time now. Something I didn't know, is that you can use this to reseal chip bags! This is huge for us. Hats off to Food saver!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Molina

customer_reviews.title: Works good but not sure if it’s refurbished
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these since mine went missing. This is the simplest, most basic model and for me that’s a good thing. I had a more expensive model but it was so sensitive to bag placement it drove me crazy to use it. This model does what it’s supposed to do without all the fuss. Very happy with it. The only reason I took away one star was because it did not come in the regular Foodsaver box. It came in a plain brown box which I know Foodsaver does not use when you buy in a store. This made me think it may have been refurbished but there is no indication anywhere of that.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie

customer_reviews.title: What seal?
customer_reviews.text: I got this item out of the box, read the instructions, and proceeded to try to use it. The locking lever did not lock, and the only way I could get any type of vacuum was if I held down BOTH the lid and the locking lever with considerable pressure. Even then, the vacuum did not last. It should not be this hard to perform a task like this, and I looked at numerous YouTube videos to see if I was doing anything wrong. I returned it to Amazon and am currently looking for another model that may work better.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Munn

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit! I tried a Nutri chef and was really disappointed but this one is exceptional! I used a friend's Food Saver that was 20 years old and sold me on Food Saver however her's was loud and constantly needed to cool off. Not this one! It works like a trooper. I used it for over an hour one after another. It only takes about 20 seconds per vacuum and seal (the other one took 45 seconds). I would recommend this to anyone a first grader could run one! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Dawn Parent

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy sealer
customer_reviews.text: Each time I tried to use the machine, I had to apply manual pressure to the lid of the food saver to get it to form a seal. Tried to reach customer service on the back of the user manuel by calling their customer service number, I was on hold for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Reached out to them on the internet through their website and never got a retuen call. Funny, but Food Saver use to be a very reliable product. I can say that Amazon Tech Support was very fast and helpful, same day response and I was very satistified with their quick solution to the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these to replace an old FoodSaver. From the start, the Vac/Seal function only worked properly about 10% of the time. The other 90% of the time, the vacuum would abort and the lid would pop open. The usual remedies didn't help. We sent it back and got a replacement, which is doing exactly the same thing. We're not idiots, and this isn't rocket science. Our old Food Saver worked fine for years. We'll be sending this one back, too. Any recommendations for a model that actually works?
customer_reviews.author: William Foster

customer_reviews.title: A great baseline sealer.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace my FoodSaver V3835 that left me high and dry one too many times. This is an inexpensive food sealer that works much easier than the last "automatic" sealer that I had. I like that I control the sealer not the sealer telling me when it is going to go ahead and seal. I've sealed over 100 lbs of meat since I got it and tonight I packaged up 8 pints of blueberries. Pro tip, freeze things like blueberries on a tray before packaging to avoid squishing. I will update this if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to get the lever locked.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first food saver so I had a little trouble at first. I thought I got a defective one because it wasn’t sucking the air. Turns out I wasn’t pushing the lever down enough. I have to really push the lever to make sure it’s locked in place. It almost feels like your going to break it off but it won’t I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: piss poor performance
customer_reviews.text: this unit, foodsaver v2244, has proved to be more temperamental than a 2 year old with diaper rash. the vacuum works at its pleasure, intermittently. a child suffering an asthma attack has a better chance of catching a breath. this unit hasn't lasted 6 months when used, at most, twice a month. our previous unit, the 7" foodsaver' lasted nearly 6 years. using a straw and freezer bag has replaced the foodsaver v2244 with better success. thank goodness our garden has just been planted and we will have some time to work on our lung capacity.
customer_reviews.author: rico ensabada

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy seal. Great for suvi cooking, and storing food
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to use. It came with a few half sealed bags and a roll of empty open bags. It took like 10 seconds to make a seal on the bag, and another 10-15 seconds to vacuum seal the other end. Overall a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jia Yang

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a food saver fifteen years ago, and it was a work beast. Unfortunately, it died last month, so I ordered a new one from Amazon. The first unit worked for about a day, before something inside broke. It would no longer stay latched shut. I returned it. The second unit worked for a week, then stopped. It would only constantly blink the seal indicator and do nothing else. I'm on my third unit now, and it seems to be ok. PROS: It's a great way to save food for long term storage. I've always enjoyed having one around. CONS: These new units seem very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rudnicke

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It is just ok, I researched before buying. I bought another brand and returned it. Not only does it not handle liquids, it stops working if it squeezes liquid out of strawberries or any item during the seal process. I have to freeze the item a little first then seal it. Works like a charm on dried items like beans, not so great on cooked or raw foods with any moisture content. Would not buy again. May upgrade to a more expensive model in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JennyD

customer_reviews.title: Vacuums Forever, Never Seals
customer_reviews.text: This just runs and runs and never completes. If you just end it with pushing "seal" you end up with nothing more than an expensive Ziploc bag. Actually, I think you can do better with Ziplocs. I'm pretty sad as I used a prior model from 2003 extensively but it's really worn out. It still does better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Grolsch

customer_reviews.title: worthless piece of junk - don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I have had difficulty every time I try to use this machine. It will not seal. it will suck the air out but it takes me 10 or more times of cleaning edges, aligning it in place and try and try and try again and again. My last one was 20 years old before it gave up working and this worthless thing has never worked like it should. Of course I bought it in July and only needed to use it 3 times and now it is over the time limit of return. Next time I will go to Costco where I can return things that don't work. I am beyond angry.
customer_reviews.author: janell

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: the idea is nice, it seems easy enough. now if it would just work like it's supposed to! I've used this twice. once on a bag of salad, it did what it's supposed to do! tried it on meat, it sucks the liquid out into the catch tray, then tries to seal. there's still air in the bag, but it stops sucking anyway. then it seals the bag, and doesn't seal where the liquid is. I tried sealing it twice, using two different bags, neither of them sealed, so I gave up. seems like the "sealer" thing isn't hot enough to melt the bags completely. perhaps it's defective? honestly, this thing is useless if it doesn't seal meat.
customer_reviews.author: b²

customer_reviews.title: Two defects in a row. Cheap materials. It’s garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I owned the old white version of this and it had weight to it. It felt like quality and it worked for years. I order this one and it’s garbage. Even the feel of it screams cheap materials. I gave it 4 stars for easy use because if it did work, it’s easy. But it didn’t. The first one didn’t seal on one end and I returned it for a replacement. The replacement didn’t vacuum. At all. This model is garbage. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JUDE FITCH

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with anything moist
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with dry items, but if you try to seal anything with moisture in it, the vacuum sealing process draws the moisture up into the machine and it does not seal. Cannot use use with tomatoes, melon, BBQ, essentially anything containing moisture. It will not seal. This appliance thus has very limited use for food preservation.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one use.  Model V2244S
customer_reviews.text: I know this is the cheaper model of Food Saver but I really thought I might get a years use. 5 bags sealed, 3 which lost suction in the freezer. The second time I tried it, there was no suction at all, even when I tried 5 different bags. I watched 5 instruction videos and none of them had this trouble, The instructions that came with the unit are pretty much useless. If you plan to try this type of sealer...look at the more expensive units. Maybe they work better.
customer_reviews.author: MarNan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for keeping food fresh and sous vide!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for when I buy bulk meats. When steaks go on sale I buy a bunch and vacuum seal them individually and freeze them. These bags are also great for sous vide cooking of meats. The reason I gave the product 4 instead of 5 stars is you really need to be careful to line the plastic up perfectly with this machine and keep the food away from the end you are sealing or air will find its way back into the bag over a couple of days. But once you get used to it the product is easy to use. Make sure to buy lots of extra bags.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Food Saver V2244 did not live up to the advertisement
customer_reviews.text: When we purchased the product, we knew Food Saver for years. We had a Food Saver Vac/seal for over 10 yrs. without an issue. This vac/sealer has two separate functions, one only seals and the other vac and seals. We liked that it had a separate sealer. This unit lasted two (2) months. We are a household of 2 seniors. After only having it two months and using it minimally, it stopped vacuuming and the motor just ran and ran. The sealer, however, continued to work fine. I would not recommend this particular model, especially, if you use it every day, which we did not.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde J Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. I couldn’t get it to seal after air was removed. Had just bought hundreds of dollars of meat and couldn’t get it to seal. After three hours of trying I just gave up and put the meat in zip lock bags. Hope it doesn’t get freezer burned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in April, just tried it today, 7/9/2020. Dead, will not turn on. Piece of crap! Should have tried it when it arrived but didn't need it then. Just tried it and it is dead as a door nail. Can't return as the return date has expired! Shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Better Than My Last One, but not anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my 10 year old food saver. I like that it locks down the bag and with just a push, it vacuums and seals, my dead one needed the button held down until it sealed. This unit is light and small so it stores easy. This works very well for an inexpensive unit, I hope I’m good for ten more years. UPDATE: This unit no longer works, it starts to vacuum and then pops, all vacuum is lost and it won’t seal . I have changed the stars to reflect my opinion. This did work well for four months.
customer_reviews.author: tcbtom

customer_reviews.title: Most control
customer_reviews.text: You have the most control with this because you can do everything manually. The automatic sealers fail quicker because of all the extra mechanisms to make it automatic. I have sealed bags right up to the very edge with this one. With the automatic ones you cannot do that. UPDATE : The black sealing tape on the bottom which heats up the bag to close it has come off of the machine
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: It's Still Working Well
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Vacuum food preserving device that I have had since the beginning of the year. The previous appliance, by another manufacturer was simply terrible and, after a poor start. did not last very long before it simply gave out. I have been using the Foodsaver FSFSSL2244-000 V2244 Machine for only a little over a month, probably every other day, and it is still functioning well and as promised. So far, I like it and do not feel like I have been cheated by making this purchase. But this time I took the precaution of buying a Warranty, just in case. As the Romans used to say, "Caveat emptor". "Let the buyer beware."
customer_reviews.author: Perry M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Brand new item - does not work
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work properly right out of the box. While the vaccum and seal functions work individually, the vacuum/seal function does not. Product will not automatically seal, it always gives the blinking red "error" indicator, and I have to seal manually, which results in a less tightly vacummed bag since there's a bit of a delay. I have gone through all of the troubleshooting tips, nothing works. I have contacted the manufacturer - no response. Don't buy this product - I'd recommend going with a different brand. Very discouraged.
customer_reviews.author: potatobagel

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality and has poor performance
customer_reviews.text: First off- the box was left by USPS in the middle of our road entrance and was opened. The suction in this machine is not good at all. I had the original Food Saver and it is MUCH better quality than this. There is no cutting bar or place to use your bags, there is no button to designate dry or moist foods. It would pull air and then as it seals, it would let air back into bag. Out of 4 bags I attempted to seal, I was only successful at 1. I would not recommend this particular Foodsaver.
customer_reviews.author: RETTA

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for something better
customer_reviews.text: I received the Food saver sealer February 14 2020 and used it several times both the canning and bag sealer feature with no issues. I pulled out the Food saver today April 17 2020 to can some jars but unfortunately the canning feature no longer works. The little grey ring for the canning hose input broke not allowing suction. And of course the return window closed March 15th.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Broke afer only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an 'upgrade' to a different vacuum sealer I had. After only a few uses, the gasket on the inside popped, causing the device to lose suction. I attempted to glue the gasket (both top and bottom popped out) but, it didnt work. I purchased this less than 3 months ago and now it's going in the trash because I can't return it. Really disappointed in this product and Foodsaver, in general.
customer_reviews.author: Enter Name Here

customer_reviews.title: Can be used only once, then it doesn't function anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product almost a year ago, and used it once, and then I didn't use it for awhile. When trying to use it again, nothing happens after plug its cable to the socket, no light no sound nothing at all. As I am outside America, I can't find any retail shop for fixing it, and seem like there is no support outside US and CA.
customer_reviews.author: chai

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove all the air from the bag.
customer_reviews.text: The first machine did not remove all the air from the bags. I got a replacement machine and that did not remove the air from the bags either.
customer_reviews.author: Helen K.

customer_reviews.title: does not give a good quality vacuum or seal
customer_reviews.text: unit does not work !! purchase something else and dont waste your money !!! i bought this unit in Oct 2019 and from day one have had to seal bags twice and help squeeze the air out as it vacuumed. it is weak and does not vacuum well at all. the seal unless you have no juice or moisture from meat in bag and lay it perfectly flag with no wrinkles will not seal good and even then its a 50/50 shot. very disappointed in what should be a quality name brand unit. i will not waste my money on food saver again brand again !!!!
customer_reviews.author: brian litzenberg

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after making less than 20 bags
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in mid March. We used it to vacuum seal 12 bags of ground beef. We planned to use it to store our garden products this year but after 9 bags it will no longer seal a bag. The vacuum function still seems to work on pre-made bags but it will not seal the beginnings of a new bag or seal the end after vacuum. Unfortunately for us we didn't use it very much when we first ordered it and it has now been 5 months. I am going to request a refund but have little hope in that taking place as it has been so long.
customer_reviews.author: adam leftwich

customer_reviews.title: Third times a charm....hopefully
customer_reviews.text: First machine arrived missing parts. Used? Second machine worked for about a month and a half. Maybe a dozen uses. Now I am waiting for a return label from Foodsaver to return this machine. Hopefully the third unit will last longer. Big hassle from my point of view.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Two duds in a row. My mom has the full size one in the same name and it works perfectly so maybe it's just these smaller ones that are duds.
customer_reviews.author: B. Denise

customer_reviews.title: food saver
customer_reviews.text: i have had this a month short of a year, only used it for hunting season last year, and for freezing vegetables this year, already it does have suction but will not seal, dont know what to do, but amazon has closed the window for returns on it and I havent had it for a year, my old order shows no one to contact, I am highly flustered, so I cant promote this product ...
customer_reviews.author: cheral eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Love this model Food Saver
customer_reviews.text: We had this model one for years and worked it to it's death. Replaced it with the same one. It is the perfect size for storing, does what it is suppose to, not too many extra features that we didn't need. Just wanted one that does the job of vacuum packing our foods for the freezer. This one is so easy to use and easy to store. I had the black one before but changed it up and went with silver this time. Both work amazing and I'm sure this new one will last as long as our other one did. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: keke

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I purchased. It has been used exactly twice and it does not vac/seal at all. Won’t buy this one ever again
customer_reviews.author: Eileen V. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Used several times with semi wet fish fillets, it started to vacuum but then eventually something makes a popping noise and it doesn’t seal or keep vacuuming so I have to press the button to stop the process. Yes I made sure the seal area was dry before starting it. So then I tried the “paper towel trick” and same results. So I pre froze the fillets a bit and tried again! Still had the issue a few times but eventually it worked. Very disappointing! Should have went with the generic brand or commercial unit which is ridiculously priced
customer_reviews.author: Slabs n dabs

customer_reviews.title: FoodSaver HAs Quality Issues Now
customer_reviews.text: Had my current FoodSaver for at least 15 years and is breaking down. Tested this model against a Geryon that was recommended by Amazon. This model didn't have all the buttons I was used to using. The juice collector was cheap plastic, bent inward, and allowed juice to get out of collector. I had to keep holding the center of the lid down (even while clamped down) that was just annoying. The Geryon model was a clear winner and cheaper in price in my home test.
customer_reviews.author: Christy P.

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum cycle doesn't end.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase 11-13-18 for $10.00 more than current. Purchased over $60.00 worth of Fresh Containers and Quick Marinator. All worked fine for about 30 days. Now when using accessory hose with containers, vacuum cycle won't turn off even though the vacuum "dimple" is depressed and container is sealed. Have to turn off manually but not sure how long to let the vacuum run before turning off. Right now I'm using the same time it takes to evacuate a gallon size empty bag. All this is necessary?
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Very poor suction!
customer_reviews.text: Will probably be barely adequate for bags. A big zero for canisters. It would run forever and never shut off. When the canister was opened there would be a slight hiss of air going in lasting less than a second. My previous unit would hiss over several seconds to let all the air back in. Maybe a bad unit but it is small and light weight. Looks like a toy. The Food Saver brand is okay but not this model. I am returning it and will get a better model.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K

customer_reviews.title: First vacuum sealer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first vacuum sealer. I raise my own beef and it is just me and the wife these days, so when we eat some of our beef, we defrost what we need which is often more than we will eat, so we vacuum pack un-cooked portions and re-freeze. This machine has really cut down on left overs fed to the dogs. I'm looking forward to trying it with our bread( we mill our own flour and make our own bread). It worked really good on our avocados also. I haven't tried it on the other stuff we grow or store, but it looks like it will work OK. Thus far. Aloha.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Tolleth

customer_reviews.title: A dream deferred
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? We always wanted one of these and when we got it we loved it. The only thing we did wrong was we didn't push the lock lever down far enough for fear of breaking it. This resulted in the machine making noise but not vacuuming. If you don't get suction, make sure the white lever is all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: epheme

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this terrible sealer
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this piece of garbage zero stars, I would. I bought this item and realized immediately that the sucking power wasn’t nearly as strong as the sealer I was replacing. Within a couple of weeks it was as clear the unit didn’t work - freezer burn on things that had been sealed along with visible air bubbles. Since I’d paid for the service protection, I called the manufacturer and they replaced the unit. The replacement is equally as bad. Don’t buy this. It’s garbage.
customer_reviews.author: EditThis

customer_reviews.title: Maximizing and preserving my food supply in a safe way.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, read other reviews and the manufacturers instructions. As long you did what was indicated worked great. Had fun learning the ins and outs of the machine. I travel between 2 homes in 2 different states, some time my husband and I are separated because of this. I use the machine to make meals for him that are easy access, frozen or sealed and for a later use. I have also been freezing strawberry, peaches and various vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: sandra allen

customer_reviews.title: Great sealer, easy-to-use, not as expensive as the fancy ones
customer_reviews.text: I love this sealer. I had a white one that finally (after at least 7 years) broke -- a piece came off the bottom so it wouldn't stay balanced anymore, but still would seal. I threw it away thinking it would be easy to replace. I bought two different sealers at the typical big box stores, but they were too expensive for what I wanted and were extremely loud. So I came to Amazon to look for a better replacement. This one is almost identical to the one I had before. It works great, is loud but not too loud, and great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to buy one of these?
customer_reviews.text: Freezer ziploc began failing on me, so I finally bit the bullet and bought a Food Saver. Love the fact that I can buy rolls of material and cut my own size bags. Others have complained that sealing fails... I have found that sealing fails when I am at fault... I have either not positioned the bag correctly, or allowed enough excess at the top. In that case, I just pop open the top, reposition the bag and try again. Sometimes I prop up the bag by placing an item under the bag in front of the Food Saver. That seems to take tension off the bag and aid in sealing.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT...wish i got one sooner
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? The intial updront cost might seem like a lot but its so handy and will save u money in the long run if u use it! Its super easy to use and operate. Worth spending the extra few bucks...bought this to seal my beef jerky and other homemade dried goods to extend their shelf life....it looks so nicely done too....definitly will be wrapping some of these treats with a bow for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Not always sealed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product.... On first use worked as expected. On second and third use noticed that the heat seal wasn’t good and needed to do multiple seals to feel comfortable that the bag was airtight. Not sure if it was the system not getting hot enough to melt the bag or bags are too thick. I used the bags that came with the system. So, I am assuming it was the system not getting hot enough. Also, noticed the suction wasn’t that strong or consistent between use.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: NO Suction to vacuum seal my food
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to vacuum seal several different types of food and there is no suction to vacuum seal the food. I would say out of 10 items, 2 actually worked. Unrfotunately i missed the date to return this item by 2 days until I tried it again tonight. i would never buy this item again, unless the company sent me a new one that worked. the cheaper, off brand, actually was better.
customer_reviews.author: barbara kovacs

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this food savor so I could put my fresh veggies from garden in bags and seal . I only used it atwiced and both times it worked...Now that my carrots ect are ready to be sealed, It quit working. I can't get it to seal up anything. I just bought it in July,2019 .... I am very dissapointed I would of thought it would work longer than 3 times of using it
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Koepke

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little flimsy at first, but works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the only downside to the product is the way the cord wraps underneath for storage. Wrapping a cord so tightly and stuffing it into a small area is never a good idea. It stretches and twists the cord and will certainly decrease its useful life span, aside from giving the cord a few twists that move the lightweight machine when plugging or unplugging. I would suggest not using the built in storage and instead just loosely looping the cord and letting it hang - it isn't very long.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: A must in the kitchen!!
customer_reviews.text: This model is probably the 4th or 5th we have had since first buying a Foodsaver. I can't say enough good things about it, love being able to save money and buy meat in bulk and vacuum seal & freeze for future use. It's also great for lunch meat and sliced cheese, to keep them fresh. And I love this particular model because it's so easy to use, you just lock it in place, push the button and it let it do the work. I will always have a Foodsaver in my kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bappert

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two weeks before breaking
customer_reviews.text: This appliance worked as promised for all of two weeks with only occasional use. Then it simply stopped sealing. Amazon is replacing it. Let's see if the replacement works any better.
customer_reviews.author: docj

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Sealing the bags was very easy, just important to place the edge correctly. It’s the same with vacuum sealing, as the open end must be placed over the drip tray. Also, first putting the food on a cookie tray, or in bag, in the freezer is very important. Sealing when the food is semi frozen prevents liquid from being sucked out and spoiling the seal.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: It kinda sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's okay. The major downside is that I have to press down on the lid to get it to actually do what it's supposed to do. When I just have it closed and latched (yes it's latched completely) it runs for a very long time and only pulls a little air out of the FoodSaver bag. Took me quite a few attempts before I stumbled upon my first successful vacuum sealed bag. Other than that, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Teej

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I coukd not see myself paying over $100 for a vacuum sealer. So good thing this one was on sale. It does the job of sealing bags and sucking the air out and then sealing. Glad to have gotten some bags and a small roll of bags that you can cut and seal to fit. Not sure how long this will last but Im hoping that I will not need a new machine for several years.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: At first, I couldn't get this to work, but my son looked at it (He also has one) and he discovered I had left a small piece of packing inside. Once that was removed it works perfectly and is so easy to run. I am sure we will be using it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have
customer_reviews.text: I buy in bulk and often cook an entire package of meat and then store it cooked in the freezer as leftovers. I have been using this machine a couple times a week for food that I would normally cook up but instead seal raw. Now i can cook when I want without eating leftovers all the time. It takes some getting used to. Sometimes it doesn't seal and definitely doesn't seal if it gets too warm. Youtube has helped me a lot to learn how to use this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great food sealer without all the bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Sometimes I vacuum seal and then press seal again for the first bag, but after it's warmed up it seals right the first time every time. I have had it not work a couple of times, but unplug/replug/re-latch it down, and it's worked like a charm. Great product for buying meat in bulk and then stocking the freezer! I also used it to make freezer meals for my maternity leave. You don't really need all the bells and whistles...this one does the job. And by the time it breaks down, I won't cry because I didn't spend a fortune on it. By that time, I will have gotten more than my money's worth out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cox

customer_reviews.title: This is the sealer you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the main purpose of using for sous vide. It’s a fantastic device. Took me a few tries to figure out how to stop the vacuum earlier (for liquids) but once I realized that you just press the seal button early it was all a go. No complaints. This is a quality machine. I would recommend based off of performance alone but also because you can get the off brand roll bags at Walmart for a really good price. Comes in really handy when buying in bulk as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: I wondered.....do I really need one?
customer_reviews.text: Now that I own it, I can honestly say yes. My former method of freezing food in a standard freezer bag resulted in enough ice crystals to create my own "ice palace". The Walt Disney Company wanted to use me as a resource. No more though, for this vacuum device draws enough air out of the bag to rival how much Amazon draws money out of my pocket. Hard to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mjrodney

customer_reviews.title: An upgrade from previous version
customer_reviews.text: My old FoodSaver finally died after over 10 years and I wanted to get the same model replacement. I was a bit surprised to see this model that looks the same in photos, is actually much different. It weighs about half as much, the plastic feels "cheap", and I was tempted to just send it back immediately. But I tried it and was very pleasantly surprised. It's quieter, way quieter than my old unit. much lighter (which is good so long as it works, and it does), and the auto-shutoff-seal cycle is much more reliable. I should have upgraded years ago instead of waiting for the old one to break.
customer_reviews.author: tj2k

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a useless model
customer_reviews.text: Purchased food saver, would not lock to start vacuum/seal....sent back and received another food saver(same model). The second one locked but it would not vacuum, very weak and little air expelled. Sent this one back for refund, do not recommend thus model!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bostjancic

customer_reviews.title: Great product, when it works
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product, when it works. The food stays fresh and frozen foods don’t get freezer burn. I even use it on fresh roasted coffee beans and they stay fresh and flavorful for months. After 3 months, the lid latch doesn’t seem to work quite so well and it pops open mid-seal. I don’t know if this is a common problem or if mine is just defective. Bottom line is that I do recommend the product in theory, but wish the construction was more sturdy as I don’t want to have to buy a new one every few months.
customer_reviews.author: Saneroz

customer_reviews.title: Not Sealing Mason Jars
customer_reviews.text: I only use these machines for sealing mason jars and have done so for years. The first time I used this for vacuum packing mason jars it did almost alright, but I had to reseal a couple out of six 8 oz. jars. The subsequent times I tried to seal jars with the vacuum feature only, the suction wasn't strong enough and I found the jars had come unsealed in the refridgerator the next day. The ensuing attempts were less and less successful. I have an older, larger Food Saver Game Saver that works well but it takes too much counter space, and have to use the older one. I am returning the recent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: nice little machine
customer_reviews.text: works great and I can even stop the suction when I want and seal bag, I dont have to wait on the machine. I sealed portions of lettuce and it works because I can turn off suction before it is crushed. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Food sealer
customer_reviews.text: This food sealer does not have a place to store the roll of bags & has no way to cut the bags like my old one did. It seems to have a slow vacuum system that seems adequate but I don't like having to press the lever all the way over each time to seal or vacuum the bag. If you don't push the lever far enough, you get a poor seal.
customer_reviews.author: Moondust11

customer_reviews.title: I just love mine and so does my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I own the bigger version. This one went to my daughter for Christmas. She loves it. She can’t believe how much food she was throwing away and dollars before the food saver. I have had mine for over two years and I will never be without. My food stays fresher 100% longer and I have saved hundreds of dollars. Your food will never ever get freezer burned. It is a purchase I will never regret buying. I just love mine and so does my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Edith R. Casias

customer_reviews.title: Great way to save food!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this model for years and recently bought another for my daughter. I have never used anything but bags so I cannot comment on the containers and that feature but this thing works great for freezing meat. I use bags but I also use a roll of bag material as it lets me make the size I want. Easy to use and I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: It performs as promised
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first one as the vacuum evacuator wouldn't work. However, I received a replacement right away (thank you, Amazon!). This one works perfectly, seals completely. Surprisingly I was able to use another brand of bag as I had some on hand. The only reason I rated "Ease of Use" as 4 stars is that the locking lever is rather stiff.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA S

customer_reviews.title: A good inexpensive vac machine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the same model. So far we have packed about 200 lbs of venison with it. The last one did maybe 700 lbs or more of venison and fish before I felt it needed replacement but still works and has been kept as a backup. The only real problem the old one has is the vac seems to have slowed a bit. Worked great out of the box. No problems. As expected.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.  Hither Creek Organics.

customer_reviews.title: See updated review
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have sealed a few steaks and they came out fine. I went from a old Seal-a-meal to this. It's much quieter and I like that it has 2 buttons to seal and to shrink/seal. UPDATE: After only 4 months, this unit is starting to fail. The lever on the right side comes undone about 50% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After an unfortunate experience with a different product we decided to go with this product. Took it out of the box read the directions pressed the button everything worked the first time. We have had nothing but good results from the product. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Seafood causes issues
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a problem with most items that I freeze, although anything with liquid becomes a major problem. Trying to freeze fresh seafood and even bloody meats becomes a problem. As when it begins the suction process the liquid interferes with the heat sealing process of the bag. Although I have seen images of the machine being used to marina meats with sauces and everything. The directions address the problem and say to pre-freeze the meats or sauce prior to sealing. But doesn't that kinda negate the whole idea?
customer_reviews.author: Pat J

customer_reviews.title: No Fancy Bells Or Whistles, But Don't Knock It Down For That
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and we have given it a bit of a run for the money. What I wish this model had was a compartment to hold bag rolls. What I liked best about it and was surprised I haven't seen other products mention this. The tray you line the top of the bag on before closing is removable which is really pretty nice is vacuum sealing something like powdered milk or other powdery substances. Just make sure you're sealing a bag inside the vacuum bag in order to minimize the amount of powder that could enter the air pump. Also it will catch any liquid moisture that may seep in from the sealing bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sincronicity

customer_reviews.title: DON'T RECOMMEND - Sealing function does not work. Customer Service does not reply
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses it started to get harder and harder to get the sealing function to work. Wasted a lot of plastic bags trying to get it to work. I sent 2 messages to customer service but all i get is an auto-reply that they will be in touch. Been waiting for over 3 weeks now and no contact. Don't recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: Zetec

customer_reviews.title: DIFFICULT TO GET VACUUM TO SEAL ALL OF THE TIME
customer_reviews.text: SOME TIMES IT WORKS WELL, BUT MOST OF THE TIME HAVE TO TRY SEVERAL TIMES TO GET THE VACUUM SEAL, EVEN WHEN DOING EXACTLY AS THE INSIDE INSTRUCTION SAY UNDER THE LID. THOUGHT THESE WERE THE BEST, BUT THE PRIOR ONE, WAS DIFFERENT BRAND AND WAS EXCELLENT, IT LASTED 6 YEARS. THIS, MAYBE WILL LAST 1 YEAR IF LUCKY!
customer_reviews.author: George Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use Legendary Name Brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for purchasing in bulk and saving unused portions in the freezer without spoilage or freezer burn. Tons of available accessories and the brand has been around forever. Very easy to use one touch controls. Comes with starter bags, a starter roll and the tube accessory for using with cans.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It is very easy to use. But like one other person commented after you use it a number of times in a row it does lose some suction. So I just take my time when I have multiple things to seal. I use it all of the time! I not only use it for freezing meats and poultry, but I use it for cheese after it has been opened, cucumber after I have cut a piece from it. I use it constantly. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: JJ1
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well built machine then Quite working after the 5th pkg. also was missing a rubber screw cover/counter top gripper on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: JJ5

customer_reviews.title: Not new product
customer_reviews.text: This was not a new product. There were chips all over the side and the bottom. There were greasy fingerprints all over the Food Saver. I did to all this until I went to clean it off before using. I will never buy a product from you again. I m also going to report to Amazon that you are marketing as new and this product clearly was not new. So frustrating. Only gave a star because it would not let me submit without it. You deserve NO stars.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Does not suction the air out enough. Food went bad ( freezer burned) as there was too much air left in bag. Look elsewhere as it does not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: expecting a good product. but what I got was a great ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! WOW! I bought this item, expecting a good product. but what I got was a great product!! I have used this sealer for about a week, now, and it works great! Having this unit in the kitchen and having it readily available helps so much. I'm able to take 'left overs' and put them into the vacuum bags and then put them into the machine. In minutes it's in the freezer. I buy meat at the market, and vacuum seal and pop it into the freezer. its awesome!!!! I have nothing to complain about.........I couldn't be happier!!!!! Id like to give it more than 5 stars.....but that's all the allow me.........
customer_reviews.author: lonny feickert

customer_reviews.title: Great for packaging up bulk buys, when you get a bag clip
customer_reviews.text: I got this to package up bulk dry goods into easier to handle packages. One issue I noticed was that when trying to seal a gallon bag of wheat it was hard to keep the wheat from getting into the sealing area. Then I found these/www.amazon.com/dp/B01AOWSG6S/ref=cfb_at_prodpg You just fill your Food save bag fold over the top and slide one of these bag clips onto the bag. You then can easily place the open end of the bag into the sealer and once it is clamped down remove the bag clip and vacuum seal as normal.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie_G

customer_reviews.title: Bought to fit in a drawer, been using heavily for 1mo.
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a month now. We buy our meat in bulk when it’s on sale and this thing has been amazing. We chose to get the small unit because we wanted something that would fit in the kitchen drawer unlike the units that hold the roll. It’s not a big deal to cut our own bags off 50-100ft rolls with scissors.
customer_reviews.author: dinowilliams

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This works great for people that don't do a lot of food sealing. I only use it about once a month after my grocery run and it works great but I could see how it could possibly over heat or loose some power if it was used for large quantities of sealing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wade

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This is easier to use and more reliable than the $200+ machine it replaced. My old "automatic" machine had to be recycled too many times to finally get a good seal. Too many misfires. The new machine seals faster. I miss the bag cutter on the old one but that is a small price to pay for a machine that works every time and gives you better control.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I have ever bought. Keeps everything fresh in the freezer plus I can reseal chips, candy etc in the original bags they can in. Its so wonderful to have in the humid MN summers.
customer_reviews.author: Jahusk

customer_reviews.title: Already save a lot of cash
customer_reviews.text: I had been promising myself I was going to buy one of these someday. I saw the lightening deal and couldn't pass it up. We had a big family and have a habit of cooking too much food. Now leftovers get preserved and eaten the following week instead of languishing in the fridge for a week before being thrown out. Great for storing our fish catches as well. I feel like I moved up in the world.
customer_reviews.author: George Cascio

customer_reviews.title: Foodsaver, You Were Once A Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Had several different models over the past ten years. I've noticed the quality has declined ever since. My first trusty Foodsaver lasted about six years through heavy usage. I have a large garden and I buy quite a bit in bulk as I have a large freezer. This one lasted about 3 weeks out of the gate. The vacuuming is weak and the seal non existent. As of late it used to take almost two years before the thing up and died, regardless of changing out gaskets. I hear they have a "heavy duty" one for about twice the price when you call the company. I have to ask, why bother offering the lesser quality one then?
customer_reviews.author: Phelps NY Chick

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but the vaccum power could be better
customer_reviews.text: I have used it a few times. Some items (larger or liquid items) I have to push down on the lid so it can get a better deal to vaccum. More work for me. The tub vaccum part doesn’t suck or vaccum well it’s very weak to not at all. It’s manageable but I’ve had this brand years ago and this version has a few good features but sadly the vaccuming even with the lock it doesn’t do what is needed correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Chautin

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have used it on multiple occasions storing meal prep such as stuffed peppers to just storing steaks or chicken. So far it has worked flawlessly and feels relatively intuitive to use. From reading other reviews I think it is important that you are setting yourself up for success when you are using it. Make sure to leave enough empty space so the ends come together flat. Also making sure the ends are dry and there isn’t too much liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Whitener

product_meta.title: Foodsaver FSFSSL2244-000 V2244 Machine for Food Preservation with Bags and Rolls Starter Kit | Number 1 Vacuum Sealer System | Compact and Easy Clean | UL Safe, Single, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Design:Vacuum Sealer MachineThe FoodSaver v2244 Vacuum Sealing System with Starter Kit is the solution to all your food storage needs; FoodSaver keeps food fresh in the freezer up to 5x longer, compared to ordinary storage methods, allowing you to save up to $2700 per year (based on buying in bulk, on sale, and preventing waste). Ordinary storage methods trap air, affecting the food's nutritional value, flavor, and overall quality. But the FoodSaver vacuum system removes most of the air from the sealed container, extending the life of food. With its sleek space saving design and user friendly control panel, the FoodSaver Food Preservation System is the ideal appliance to preserve a variety of foods.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The FoodSaver V2244 Vacuum Sealing System is a manual vacuum sealer with crush free instant seal and an accessory hose port compatible with all FoodSaver containers.
feature_bullets: Stretch your dollar: Meat preserved with the foodsaver system in the freezer can last upto 3 years and still taste fresh, flavorful, and freezer burn free; prep ahead meals, leftovers, and produce stored in the fridge will stay fresh upto weeks later instead of spoiling in days

Number 1 vacuum sealing system: Foodsaver keeps food fresh upto 5x longer compared to ordinary storage methods; Led light indicators easily guide you through the vacuum sealing process; Just press the vacuum and seal button to remove the air that causes freezer burn and spoilage
Easy lock and latch: 1 handed operation lets you easily lock the lid with a simple turn compared to other competitive units that require considerable force with 2 hands to close and lock the lid
Seal wet and dry items: No need for multiple modes; The patented removable drip tray will catch any overflow liquid and is dishwasher safe, making this kitchen appliance easy to clean and maintain

NRTL Tested & Certified Product: All Foodsaver appliances are ETL or UL certified by Nationally Recognized Test Laboratories (NRTLs) for compliance with applicable Product safety test standards; Safety is our number 1 priority

Compatible with fresh handheld sealer & other accessories: Attach the handheld sealer with the accessory hose included with your machine to start preserving food in the refrigerator and pantry with FoodSaver zipper bags and fresh containers; Other optional accessories include regular and wide mouth mason jar sealers and bottle stoppers for wine and oil bottles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars8,546 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
